recipesJson.name: Tropical Milk and Cookies
recipesJson.author: spicygal
recipesJson.description: This is mild but flavorful - sweet but not too much.  While there's nothing super exciting about it it is a very pleasant vape.  It does help to steep it a little while.   The passionfruit, Rainier cherry, raspberry and Sugar orchid form the base with milk and honey and cookie to back it up then a touch of vanilla bean and frosting to round it out - and it works well.
